catalog_script_client.name: loadRefFields

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_a06bd3642fe361106cc8bea62799b6db
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:080bd3ec2f6f21106cc8bea62799b667</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>loadRefFields</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
        return;
    }
	alert(g_form.getValue('class_name'));
	//g_form.setValue('class_name',g_form.getValue('task_class'));
    var ga = new GlideAjax('x_665266_mypdiapps.dataUpdateUtility');
    ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'populateMRVS');
    ga.addParam('sysparm_class_info', g_form.getValue('class_name')); // give here the requestor variable name
    ga.getXML(classVrs);

    function classVrs(response) {
        var val = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
		alert(val);
        g_form.setValue('task_fields', val); // give name of MRVS variable set here
    }
    //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-06-17 17:04:13</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>a06bd3642fe361106cc8bea62799b6db</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>loadRefFields</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="MyPdiApps" source="x_665266_mypdiapps">7cef8a8a2f1b61106cc8bea62799b66a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="MyPdiApps">7cef8a8a2f1b61106cc8bea62799b66a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_a06bd3642fe361106cc8bea62799b6db</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-06-27 08:51:45</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set display_value="Task Fields">8ab0f2902fa321106cc8bea62799b67f</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
